name: Layla in Wonderland (2022)
description:
A visual-novel edition of the classic Alice in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll - except Alice has been replaced with Layla.

Made in 48 hours for Game Jam Aotearoa 2022.

I always wanted a more fun way to experience classic books, and this was a small attempt at seeing how I might do that.

Replacing Alice with Layla was a simple string replacement I did to impress a friend for fun~

CONTROLS
-Left click: Next page
-Right click: Previous page
-X at the top left to exit the app
